title: Walking country
creator_credit: Conon Fraser, Tom Williamson and New Zealand National Film Unit
brief_description: Mountains and forests cover more than half of New Zealand, and the country is served by a well-maintained network of walking tracks. With its varied scenery, New Zealand offers magnificent walking Country.
creator_credit_for_label: Conon Fraser, Tom Williamson and New Zealand National Film Unit
